echo

A calm, introspective space to organize your thoughts, track your well-being, and reflect on your daily life.

All The Tools You Need To Reflect and Grow

From structured CBT exercises to a freeform journal, Echo provides a comprehensive toolkit for your mental wellness journey.

Affirmations

Start your day with positivity and reinforce empowering beliefs.

Journaling

Capture your thoughts and organize your life.

Thought Records

Use CBT-based tools to challenge and reframe unhelpful thought patterns.

Planner & Calendar

Organize your life, track goals, and view your entries in a calendar.

Medication Tracker

Log medications and create bundles for easy tracking.
